problems.title: Inverted Pyramid Star Pattern
problems.description:
Print an inverted pyramid pattern using asterisks (*).

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print an inverted pyramid pattern with N rows. The pyramid should be centered with spaces before each row, starting from the widest row at the top.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*********
 *******
  *****
   ***
    *

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
*****
 ***
  *
hintsList: Start from the widest row (2*N-1 stars) and decrease by 2 stars each row. Increase spaces before each row.

problems.title: Number Pyramid Pattern
problems.description:
Print a pyramid pattern using digits (0-9). Each row contains consecutive digits starting from 1, wrapping around after 9.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a number pyramid with N rows. The pyramid should be centered with digits increasing in each row (1, 2, 3, ..., 9, 0, 1, ...).
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
    1
   123
  12345
 1234567
123456789

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
  1
 123
12345
hintsList: Each row has (2*i-1) numbers starting from 1. Add spaces before numbers to center the pyramid.

problems.title: Left-Aligned Pyramid Star Pattern
problems.description:
Print a left-aligned pyramid pattern using asterisks (*). Stars should be on the left side with spaces on the right.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a left-aligned pyramid pattern with N rows. Each row should have increasing stars starting from 1, with spaces filling the rest.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*    
**   
***  
**** 
*****

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
*  
** 
***
hintsList: Print i stars followed by (N-i) spaces for row i. Each row should have exactly N characters.

problems.title: Reverse Number Right Triangle
problems.description:
Print a right triangle pattern where each row contains numbers in reverse order, starting from the row number down to 1.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a reverse number triangle with N rows. Each row should print numbers from the row number down to 1.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
1
21
321
4321
54321

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
1
21
321
hintsList: For row i, print numbers from i down to 1. Use nested loops - outer loop for rows, inner loop counts backwards.

problems.title: Alphabet Pyramid Pattern
problems.description:
Print a pyramid pattern using uppercase letters starting from 'A'.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print an alphabet pyramid with N rows. The pyramid should be centered with letters increasing in each row.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
    A
   ABC
  ABCDE
 ABCDEFG
ABCDEFGHI

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
  A
 ABC
ABCDE

testCases.expectedOutput:
A
    ABC
   ABCDE
  ABCDEFG
 ABCDEFGHI
ABCDEFGHIJK

hintsList: Each row has (2*i-1) letters starting from 'A'. Add spaces before letters to center the pyramid.

problems.title: Diamond Star Pattern
problems.description:
Print a diamond pattern using asterisks (*). The pattern should have an upper pyramid and a lower inverted pyramid.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing half the height of the diamond (total rows will be 2*N-1).

Output Format:
Print a diamond pattern with 2*N-1 rows. The first N rows form an upward pyramid, and the next N-1 rows form an inverted pyramid.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
    *
   ***
  *****
 *******
*********
 *******
  *****
   ***
    *

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
  *
 ***
*****
 ***
  *
hintsList: Print pyramid from 1 to N rows, then print inverted pyramid from N-1 down to 1. Total rows = 2*N-1.

problems.title: Hollow Pyramid Star Pattern
problems.description:
Print a hollow pyramid pattern using asterisks (*). Only the border should be filled with stars, the interior should be empty (spaces).

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows.

Output Format:
Print a hollow pyramid pattern with N rows. The pyramid should be centered. Only the border lines should have stars, interior should have spaces.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
    *
   * *
  *   *
 *     *
*********

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
  *
 * *
*****
hintsList: First row has 1 star centered. Middle rows have stars at first and last positions with spaces in between. Last row is all stars.

problems.title: Number Square Pattern
problems.description:
Print a square pattern where each row contains the same number repeated. Row 1 has all 1s, row 2 has all 2s, etc.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows and columns.

Output Format:
Print a square pattern with N rows and N columns. Each row contains the same number (row number) repeated N times.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
11111
22222
33333
44444
55555

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
111
222
333
hintsList: For each row i, print the number i repeated N times. Use nested loops - outer for rows, inner for columns.

problems.title: Cross/X Pattern
problems.description:
Print an X pattern using asterisks (*). The pattern should form an X shape with N rows and N columns.

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the number of rows and columns (must be odd).

Output Format:
Print an X pattern with N rows and N columns. Stars should appear on both diagonals.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
*   *
 * *
  *
 * *
*   *

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
* *
 *
* *
hintsList: For each row i, print '*' at positions i and (n-i+1), and spaces elsewhere. The middle row (i = n/2+1) has only one star.

problems.title: Plus Sign Pattern
problems.description:
Print a plus sign pattern using asterisks (*). The pattern should form a plus sign with N rows and N columns (N must be odd).

Input Format:
A single integer N representing the size (must be odd).

Output Format:
Print a plus sign pattern with N rows and N columns. Stars should form a plus sign with a horizontal and vertical line through the center.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5

Sample Output
  *
  *
*****
  *
  *

Sample Input
3

Sample Output
 *
***
 *
hintsList: The middle row (i = n/2+1) should have all stars. The middle column (j = n/2+1) of all other rows should have a star. All other positions should have spaces.
